channel.title: Problems With Storm PK Source
channel.description: Ok so i have managed to get the server running with help from the fine people here on forums! However while checking the source i noticed a few problems with the source. I had a friend of mine log into the server just so i could test the dueling and trade handlers. I have noticed that everytime i try to trade i get into the trade screen and try to put an item up for trade the server crashes? I've tried to find a tut on forums....found nothing! I've tried to go through the code...found nothing. In fact the files that handle trade on the server are exact to the files i have for another server. If anyone has any ideas or possibly a solution to this problem i would greatly appreciate the help?

item.title: Problems With Storm PK Source

item.description:
@angels0fdeath01 wrote:

Ok so i have managed to get the server running with help from the fine people here on forums! However while checking the source i noticed a few problems with the source. I had a friend of mine log into the server just so i could test the dueling and trade handlers. I have noticed that everytime i try to trade i get into the trade screen and try to put an item up for trade the server crashes? I’ve tried to find a tut on forums…found nothing!
I’ve tried to go through the code…found nothing. In fact the files that handle trade on the server are exact to the files i have for another server. If anyone has any ideas or possibly a solution to this problem i would greatly appreciate the help?
